00028 #ifndef MATRIXCHECK_H
00029 #define MATRIXCHECK_H
00030 
00031 #include <assert.h>
00032 #include <string>
00033 #include <stdlib.h>
00034 #include "Util.h"
00035 #include "Verbose.h"
00036 #include "RegressionCheck.h"
00037 
00043 class MatrixCheck : public RegressionCheck {
00044 
00045 public:
00046 
00060   MatrixCheck(const std::string &generated, const std::string &gold, double eps, 
00061             int rowSkip, int colSkip, bool matchNames, unsigned int allowedMisMatch) :
00062     m_Generated(generated), m_Gold(gold), m_Epsilon(eps),
00063     m_RowSkip(rowSkip), m_ColSkip(colSkip), m_MatchNames(matchNames),
00064     m_AllowedMisMatch(allowedMisMatch) {}
00065 
00071   bool check(std::string &msg) {
00072     std::string generated(m_Generated), gold(m_Gold);
00073     msg = "";
00074     bool success = true;
00075     // Fix pathnames to work for this platform.
00076     generated = Util::getPathName(generated.c_str());
00077     gold = Util::getPathName(gold.c_str());
00078     /* Santiy checks. */
00079     if(!Util::fileReadable(generated.c_str())) {
00080       msg += "Can't open file: " + ToStr(generated.c_str()) + " to read.";
00081       return false;
00082     }
00083     if(!Util::fileReadable(gold.c_str())) {
00084       msg += "Can't open file: " + ToStr(gold.c_str()) + " to read.";
00085       return false;
00086     }
00087     if(!(m_ColSkip >= 0 && m_RowSkip >= 0 && m_Epsilon >= 0)) {
00088       msg += "invalid ColSkip, RowSkip, and/or Epsilon";
00089       return false;
00090     }
00091     /* Count up differences. */
00092     // push handler to throw exception
00093     Err::setThrowStatus(true); 
00094     int diffCount;
00095     try {
00096         diffCount = Util::matrixDifferences(generated.c_str(), gold.c_str() , 
00097                                             m_ColSkip, m_RowSkip, m_Epsilon, false, m_MatchNames);
00098     } 
00099     catch(Except &e) {
00100         msg += "Caught exception: " + ToStr(e.what());
00101         return false;
00102     }
00103     Err::popHandler();
00104 
00105     if(diffCount > (int)m_AllowedMisMatch) {
00106       success = false;
00107       msg += "File: " + generated + " vs " + gold + ": ";
00108       msg += ToStr("Expecting no more than ") + ToStr(m_AllowedMisMatch) + ToStr(" found: ") + ToStr(diffCount);
00109     }
00110     return success;
00111   }
00112 
00113 
00114   std::string m_Generated;   
00115   std::string m_Gold;        
00116   double m_Epsilon;      
00117   int m_RowSkip;        
00118   int m_ColSkip;        
00119   bool m_MatchNames;    
00120 
00121 
00122   unsigned int m_AllowedMisMatch;  
00123 };

00125 #endif /* MATRIXCHECK_H */
